# Forced Interrogation (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Language-Dependent Spells|language-dependent]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** One standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 feet + 5 feet/two levels)

**Target:** 1 creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 55

As *[[Compelling Question (Spell)|compelling question]]**,* above, except that the answer may require up to twenty-five words. Answering the question remains a free action, and the details of the answer still modify the saving throw.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *greater compelling question* to *forced interrogation* to avoid duplication.
